page.title: 17Ecology (sheet 2)
page.content: Nowadays many of the common species of wildlife are becoming rare. This is often because man is spoiling the countryside by using chemicals in farming, draining swamp land, cutting doen hedges and woodlands,and building without thought for the future. Our school is in a very lovely setting and we are lucky. We do our best to look after the environment. We have a pond in which we have put tadpoles so that they can grow into frogs and newts in safety. We put out food for the birds in the winter so that they will survive the hard weather. We have a nursery in which we plant seeds. Later, when they have grown into young trees, we will plant them out in the woods.
